Original:
當天來現場聽歌， 今天的歌手是洋蔥， 第一次聽 我覺得他唱歌還好好聽， 看了歌手的fb跟老公約好下次禮拜六去他另外一個駐唱的地方在捧場一下 ，但是我覺得 也還蠻適合當諧星因為太搞笑了。

鼓手餐廳裡面的裝潢真的很用心每一個角落都很有氛圍， 環境真的很棒也很享受當下。

餐飲的話是覺得 還可以~ 只是覺得多加套餐150元不划算， 還有點的牛肉串 烤的過乾感覺沒有很新鮮， 才那麼一點點這一般般就200元，餐點有點普通， 會建議先在外面吃飽，再來這裡聽歌，然後點不生消。

店的主餐的份量也蠻少的，可能來這裡真的是是氣氛，所以想要吃飽一點，就要多點一些餐才足夠。

然後店家的服務生我覺得還蠻親切不錯的會很細心的介紹。

I came to listen to the song on the spot that day. Today's singer is onion. For the first time, I think he thinks he sings well. I watched the singer's FB and her husband's appointment with her husband next week. I think it is quite suitable to be a comedian because it is too funny.

If you think it ’s okay, it’ s just that it ’s not cost -effective to add 150 yuan for more packages, and there is a bit of dried beef skewers. It’ s not very fresh. It ’s so a little bit. It’ s a bit ordinary. Eat outside, come here to listen to the song, and then click on.

The main meal of the shop is also quite small. It may be really an atmosphere here, so if you want to eat a bit, you need to order more meals.

Then the waiter's waiter, I think it is quite good and carefully introduced.

Original:
先說結論：場地氣氛好、停車還算方便，工讀生、助理服務態度不錯，但餐點、飲料不OK，CP值低且價格不透明，店家經營的方式也很糟糕，不推薦這間做為聚餐場所，更不推薦一生一次的婚禮辦在這裡。

公司2020年的歲末聚餐辦在這裡，一個人660的外燴費用，吃到滿滿的大澱粉(炒飯、義大利麵，料很少)，青菜、肉、炸物的份量皆少又補得慢，飲料加很多水味道很淡，最扯的是活動當天沒有廚師，而是讓店家的助理自己進廚房料理，扯到一個不行。

一開始索取報價，我就明確告知「公司的預算剛剛好，所以我要含稅含服務費的金額」，結果店家報了一個價格，我居然到活動前再次確認，才被告知是「不含稅金額」，甚至還被店家說「一般餐廳都這樣，我哪知道你們那麼單純」暗指什麼明眼人都看得出來，更不要說我辦過哪麼多次活動，這是我碰到的第一間這種報價方式的餐廳，要不是我主動問，我就得要自己貼錢辦這場活動了！

店家轉不接散客後，沒有駐唱歌手也不接受刷卡，沒有刷卡機這件事也是活動前我再次確認才知道，店家報價時跟活動時有什麼異動絕對不會主動通知，可能是期待當天給客戶一個大大的surprise。

取消駐唱歌手，現場變成KTV設備，歌單頗新但設備很爛，麥克風老是爆音，麥克風對到音響又會爆音，在台上唱歌的人常常不知何去何從。

此間餐廳已被公司集團列入黑名單，絕對不會再回訪，看中他們場地的人，良心建議租借場地就好。
EN:
Let's talk about the conclusion: The atmosphere of the venue is good, the parking is convenient, the working attitude of the work and the assistant service, but the meal, drinks are not OK, the CP value is low and the price is opaque. The place of dinner is not recommended here for a lifetime.

The company's dinner at the end of the year in 2020 is held here. A person's 660 foreign stew costs, eat a full starch (fried rice, pasta, rarely ingredients). Slowly, the drink and a lot of water taste are very light. The most tip is that there is no chef on the day of the event. Instead, let the store's assistant enter the kitchen and cook it.

At the beginning, I requested the offer, and I clearly informed that "the company's budget is just right, so I want the amount of tax includes the service fee." As a result, the store reported a price. "The amount of tax", even the store said, "This is the case in general, I know you are so simple." I don't want to see any of the people, let alone what I have done. This is the first I have encountered. A restaurant with such a quotation, if not, I would have to ask for this event myself!

After the store does not transfer the client, there is no resident singer or accepting the card. It is also before the event. I confirmed before the event. I only know that when the store quotes and the event, what kind of motion will definitely not be notified. It may be expected to look forward to it. It may be expected Give customers a large Surprise on the same day.

Canceling the singer, the scene became a KTV device. The song list was quite new but the equipment was very bad. The microphone was always explosive. The microphone would explode the sound again. People who sang on the stage often did not know where to go.

The restaurant here has been blacklisted by the company's group. It will never return to visit. If you look at the people in their venue, the conscience is recommended to rent the venue.

Original:
吃飽飯後想找一家可以喝喝飲料聽聽歌的餐廳，於是去到現場，點了二杯調酒一杯咖啡，一杯調酒是我自己要喝的，另一杯是我先生要喝的，但是因為他要開車回台北的關係，所以點了一杯咖啡現場喝，調酒外帶回家喝。
今天是第一次來到這家餐廳，所以不知道他們現場演唱只有19:30-21:30，到達時已經快9點了，點完飲料後，加上貴公司很晚才送來飲料，所以聽了不到10首歌，現場演唱就結束，我還跟我先生說下次早點來順便可以用餐，於是沒歌聽的我們就結帳準備離開，櫃檯把我們消費的單子印給我們時，我們都嚇到了，17xx元，這怎麼算的，平均一杯飲料快600元，看一下明細，上面有二個餐點，我們就表示那兩個不是我們點的，這時女服務人員請了另一個男服務員來，男服務員說沒關係刪掉就好，但是這時卻問了我們一句：真的沒吃到吼？其實這句話聽了蠻不舒服的，因為貴公司自己點餐疏忽錯誤，不知是別桌點的加來我們桌，還是其它原因？聽起來很像是玩笑話，但是還是覺得不該這樣詢問。
我當天是坐A9桌，其實大致上服務人員的服務都很好，也很熱心的祝我感冒趕快好，所以我還是給了四顆星，只是希望你們能改進的更好，所以特地留言給你們，希望下次不要再有這樣的狀況出現了。

After eating full meal, I wanted to find a restaurant to drink drinks and listen to the song, so I went to the scene, ordered two cups of sake of bartending a cup of coffee. One cup of bartending was what I had to drink, and the other was what my husband had to drink. But because he was going to drive back to Taipei, he ordered a cup of coffee to drink and took home to drink.
Today is the first time to come to this restaurant, so I do n’t know that they only sing on the spot only 19: 30-21: 30. It ’s almost 9 o'clock when it arrives. After ordering the drink, plus your company only sent the drink late. So after listening to less than 10 songs, the live singing ended. I also told my husband that we can dine early next time, so we did n’t listen to it. , We are all scared, 17xx yuan, how can this be calculated, the average drink is almost 600 yuan, look at the details, there are two meals on it, we say that the two are not us. At this time, the female service staff invited the service staff. Another male waiter came. The male waiter said that it doesn't matter to delete it, but then asked us: I really didn't roar?In fact, this sentence is pretty uncomfortable, because your company has a negligence for ordering meals. I do n’t know if it is a table with our table, or for other reasons?It sounds like a joke, but I still feel that I shouldn't ask this way.
I was sitting on the A9 table that day. In fact, the service staff was very good, and I also enthusiastically wished me to catch a cold, so I still gave four stars, but I just hope you can improve it better, so leave a message for special messages, so leave a message to give it a special message to give it. You, I hope that this situation will not appear next time.
